semantic_identifier: [GOLD-30]: Integrations: Detect and remediate existing duplicate field mappings on load/save
title: Integrations: Detect and remediate existing duplicate field mappings on load/save

sections.text: Some integrations have already-saved field mappings that contain duplicates or conflicting source→destination pairs, causing downstream duplicate signals and slow/failed sync runs. Add backend logic to detect duplicate/conflicting mappings when fetching or persisting integration configs, and return a structured warning/error payload identifying the conflicting fields. Provide a one-time remediation path (auto-dedup where safe, otherwise require user resolution) to prevent legacy bad configs from degrading integration performance.
